entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rivière-du-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:57 AM EST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.9°C
